name: Disqus
natural_language_description: 这是 Disqus 节点。主要用于: Access data on Disqus

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: forum

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get All Categories (值: getCategories) - Return a list of categories within a forum
Get All Threads (值: getThreads) - Return a list of threads within a forum
Get All Posts (值: getPosts) - Return a list of posts within a forum

id.name: id
id.description: The short name(aka ID) of the forum to get Threads
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Forum Name | 作用: The short name(aka ID) of the forum to get Threads | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: related (值: None) - You may specify relations to include with your response
include (值: None) - You may specify relations to include with your response
order (值: None) - You may specify order to sort your response
since (值: None) - Unix timestamp (or ISO datetime standard)

thread (值: None) - Looks up a thread by ID. You may pass us the "ident" query type instead of an ID by including "forum". You may pass us the "link" query type to filter by URL. You must pass the "forum" if you do not have the Pro API Access addon.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100
